pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface to the Table Storage Service in 'Azure' // An interface to the table storage service in 'Azure': https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/services/storage/tables/. Supplies functionality for reading and writing data stored in tables, both as part of a storage account and from a 'CosmosDB' database with the table service API. Part of the 'AzureR' family of packages.
